Articles.Content:
Ignore this post

Edited September 19, 2016 by The Raging Sandwich

What was found to be the cause of the Apollo 1 fire?

Who was initially going to be the original commander of Apollo 13?

Why was Apollo 8 delayed? What happened because of it?

What is Apollo 6?

Who was the commander of Gemini 3?

Who from the Mercury 7 is still alive?

Which of the Mercury 7 never flew during Mercury?

Who was the original LMP of Apollo 12?

I hate to say it, but your in the wrong company. Most of us know too much about space history, especially myself  . I'll be amazed if you get half of these right without googling the answers as these can be some tough questions. 

Lastly I only asked questions I knew the answer to, so again, this is from 4 years of reading and eagerly absorbing NASA info.

12 minutes ago, ZooNamedGames said:

What was found to be the cause of the Apollo 1 fire?

Who was initially going to be the original commander of Apollo 13?

Why was Apollo 8 delayed? What happened because of it?

What is Apollo 6?

Who was the commander of Gemini 3?

Which of the Mercury 7 never flew during Mercury?

Who was the original LMP of Apollo 12?

I hate to say it, but your in the wrong company. Most of us know too much about space history, especially myself  . I'll be amazed if you get half of these right without googling the answers as these can be some tough questions. 

Lastly I only asked questions I knew the answer to, so again, this is from 4 years of reading and eagerly absorbing NASA info.

You're probably right. I'm just gonna delete this thread if I can. However, I can answer those questions but as its getting late and I have school tomorrow, I'll have to do it in the morning.
Locked by OP request.
